abstract: Tom Shields wins Arena Pro Swim Series' 100-meter butterfly final in Charlotte, NC.
lead_paragraph: The former N.C.A.A. champion Shields won the Arena Pro Swim Series’ 100-meter butterfly final in Charlotte, N.C., overshadowing the matchup between the Olympic gold medalists Phelps and Lochte.

headline.main: Tom Shields Bests Michael Phelps and Ryan Lochte

snippet: The former N.C.A.A. champion Shields won the Arena Pro Swim Series’ 100-meter butterfly final in Charlotte, N.C., overshadowing the matchup between the Olympic gold medalists Phelps and Lochte.
